org.schema.game.mod

Class Mod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.schema.game.mod.Mod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    b, Kp, Kq, Kr, Ks

    public abstract class Mod
extends Object
implements Kp, Kq, Kr, Ks
    This class provides hooks for a mod. Since it is a little clunky, expect some changes in this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mod()
      Makes a new mod.

                         org.schema.common.util.linAlg.Vector3i vector3i2)

        Called whenever the player enters/exists a block. Can be both events at one time
        Specified by:
        onPlayerChangedContol in interface Kr
        Parameters:
        playerState - the player, who entered/exited a block
        vector3i - the location of a block, currently unknown if entered or exited block
        sendable - the entity, containing the entered/exited block
        vector3i2 - the location of a block, currently unknown if entered or exited block
